RESTORECARD_DESCRIPTION: Use this command to restore a burnt card within 3 days of burning it
CARD_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} The card with code `{{code}}` was not found in your burned cards
CARD_EXPIRED: {{author}} The card with code `{{code}}` has expired and cannot be restored
RESTORE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to restore the card `{{code}}` for {{amount}} **{{currency}}**?
EMBED_FOOTER: You can restore this card until
MISSING_CURRENCY: {{author}} You need {{amount}}** {{currency}}** to restore a card
RESTORE_SUCCESSFUL: {{author}} The card with code `{{code}}` has been successfully restored
